items.action: Wire audit-loader.ts into results/page.tsx (replace DEMO_AUDITS with getAllAuditSummaries), import AgentCard/RadarChart into audit detail page with real data.
items.impact: Closes the dashboard data pipeline gap -- the #1 weakness cited by 4 of 6 agents
items.resolution: Replaced DEMO_AUDITS with getAllAuditSummaries() in results/page.tsx. Built full audit detail page with RadarChart, ScoreProgression, AgentCard grid, highlights, divergent opinions, and action items. Added AuditSummary and ScoreHistoryEntry types. Updated audit-loader return types.

items.action: Add error.tsx, loading.tsx, and not-found.tsx in app/ and app/results/ for graceful error handling.
items.impact: Prevents raw Next.js error pages, improves resilience for demos
items.resolution: Created 7 boundary files: app/error.tsx, app/loading.tsx, app/not-found.tsx, app/results/error.tsx, app/results/loading.tsx, app/results/[auditId]/not-found.tsx, app/results/[auditId]/loading.tsx. All with retry buttons and skeleton loaders.

items.action: Enable noUncheckedIndexedAccess and noImplicitReturns in tsconfig.json, fix resulting type errors.
items.impact: Aligns implementation with own strict-mode philosophy, catches undefined access bugs
items.resolution: Enabled both flags in tsconfig.json. Fixed 4 type errors: ScoreProgression payload[0] guard, data[length-1] optional chain, validate.test.ts errors[0] optional chains. All indexed access now properly handles undefined.

items.action: Wire validate.ts into audit-loader.ts: replace JSON.parse(raw) as T with parseSynthesisReport/validateAgentEvaluation.
items.impact: Connects runtime validation to data loading -- validates before data enters the type system
items.resolution: Replaced JSON.parse(raw) as SynthesisReport in getAudit() with parseSynthesisReport(raw). Invalid reports now log warnings and return null instead of passing bad data to the type system.

items.action: Add component tests for AgentCard and RadarChart using Vitest + React Testing Library.
items.impact: Current 19 tests only cover lib/ utilities; zero component coverage
items.resolution: Added @testing-library/react, jsdom, @vitejs/plugin-react. Created vitest.config.ts with jsdom environment. Added 10 AgentCard tests (name, role, score, verdict, score bars, strengths, weaknesses, critical issues, one_line, aria-label) and 3 RadarChart tests (renders, aria-label, size prop). Total: 32 tests passing.
